name: 无尽冲锋/RuPush
description:
"RuPush", short for Rush & Push, is a casual adventure game containing some Clicker elements, with many items and weapons that can be simultaneously fired (in auto mode, the weapon power may be increased or decreased)
Endless levels, increasingly higher damage, get rid of all pressure from you. When bored, you may as well open this game and play, so relaxed.

Control description is shown here:
Keyboard:
Q,W,E: Light/Heavy/Special Weapon switch
A,S,D: Light/Heavy/Special Weapon firing
Z,X: Enable Auto-mode for Light/Heavy Weapon
F: Fire Ultimate Weapon
1,2,3,4: Use items shown at the bottom of the screen
~, Tab: Game Pause/Speed-up
F1, Keypad+, Keypad-: Music switch, +/-Volume

Joystick:
A,B,LT: Light/Heavy/Special Weapon switch
X,Y,LB: Light/Heavy/Special Weapon firing
RB,RT: Enable Auto-mode for Light/Heavy Weapon
Right Axis Pressed: Fire Ultimate Weapon
Left Axis of corresponding direction+X: Use items shown at the bottom of the screen
START, BACK: Game Pause/Speed-up
